body: Hi Theodoros, Thank you very much for the clarification! Yes, the installation of the latest OpenFOAMv1606 is much smoother. Allow me to explain my procedures to run the demo file: Since the current demo file of Butterfly doesn't work with OpenFOAM v1606, I used the case file generated from the Create Case file component. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx9Wf7X9e6vaJQNMYBLsQcklyqq*eumdWlFAIUZHjcDpB945NWGWas82-As9vsez2-aVriyE6cIu*Aoptgotb0f7/Image1.png)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx92WhJo4k6mkWTvr4zJJ9BwcOsLn9KISDtCoAFS86MMw-HcUHG35VKaz34n-4KYBKpJB2LOKSVjYxpN3o2PE6WR/Image2.png) then I start OpenFOAM: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx8UdbuJt1zsak3dd1XbnMyw7KahZQsBWezAXkcJkCkQQxUcoUg*LuoJ5A78YcCwDXlf3wF*68p4AhvPD8YVo33m/Image4.png) run blockMesh: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx*HTeNlwjZGldMIeQlI6jbNdHXpGYXTdxYrwH45hbXB31PIX-ZgPem3nOcNvUFEQ8v*f--iWPmSuKjiOjnNjGna/Image5.png) run snappyHexMesh: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx8qvhDAYhxDV*wQkmkQgXjeDl4VS-8440Mrh2NTRe92EjlEDkiqHeqPWLv*SvvLl2BQ1lGCJmEMgEawQP3yrPBW/Image6.png) run checkMesh, and there is one check failed [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx8tEICSrjaLzCvG4gLQ9PHKSb6lhVpTFIWP8juXVC*I4XT849h6gPWMvGGBTkj*F8YuhL3ZrJwNMFNlX0Q1VSWo/Image7.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx9MPCzDNuyPqudVrKr8afeaxlD0UWvmxcS7qbMMK5GpKW5Epz*S79oMq3sO-RFjz5gVG5F09V43owQYFgKjVF5x/Image8.png) I didn't manage to run updateFvSchemes, or this is not the correct command for this step as it didn't work obviously ... [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx*3B*R-ScP2gbfQFhUXNgRowZN3DhACtUvPpN6kldkvbVyF5cP7asAXSQM6WpvGkXZkWEArKX6WxMqvxp*a660-/Image11.png) Nevertheless, I continued to modify the following files: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx*qC50pn-THrhNnoQ8LGJssqzOfRj7GZfc5AM234ogwx71TykogjYjIkRBbFIJK-Wb2mlikaeGJSXt3smHaEALf/Image9.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx8bWlZRWoAkbpgPrdFbHQgP6iXPfR43UboqGxO0OiTKhPk4OQJQnJ1DAckL8Go8ZWHcjHoH*0HsK0nxHGpuxCks/Image10.png) and lastly, run simpleFoam which was not successful: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx*YdCaUOVGBNPSpt*sHr2H2tkM730YMKM-15VZLVspwPypph6XcCjeQPRncpSnvkoQhTJitWjBVeZHMjXp1cia-/Image12.png) I have to admit that I'm only trying to follow the steps and get the demo simulation running correctly, and I haven't started to understand what each step is doing and the parameters associated. I think I must have missed important steps or specified wrong command in this process, and hope you can kindly advise. Thank you!
